attributes.action: Change the leasehold laws so that there is a maximum amount in legal fees payable by the leaseholder in right to manage, lease extensions and other such cases.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently, it seems that the leasehold legal system is set up so that unscrupulous landlords, and solicitors acting on their behalf, can legally extort money from leaseholders by excessively prelonging legal procedures such as leasehold extensions, right to manage, and other such cases (for which all "reasonable" legal expenses are payable by the leaseholder) for as long as possible at the leaseholder's expense.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
